meanings: (몸이) (상처 등이) painful, sore, (병으로) sick, ill, (동사로 쓰여) hurt, ache

vlive.korean: 아파서 출근 못했어요? You couldn't go to work because you were sick? 듣기 View video GOT7 : ^^
vlive.english: You couldn't go to work because you were sick?

vlive.korean: 마음이 아파서? Because it broke your heart? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : Happy Birthday to Han and Felix! 🎉🎉🎉
하고 싶은데도 아파서 못하는 상황이면 어떡해? I want to do it but I go into situation where I can't do it? 듣기 View video SF9 : 찬희휘영
vlive.english: I want to do it but I go into situation where I can't do it?

vlive.korean: 나 생각보다 안 아파서 - 그래서 뭐래요 팬분들이? But it didn't hurt as much as I expected. - So, what did they say? 듣기 View video X1 : 시간 내에 제목이 떠오르지 않았습니다😂
vlive.english: But it didn't hurt as much as I expected. - So, what did they say?

vlive.korean: [오늘 아파서 서울 갈 기세] 바로 올라가실 것 같은 느낌이... [So unwell to carry on] he needed to be taken back to Seoul today... 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP19 #권정열이왜여기서나와 #프로달콤러 #역대급버스킹스케일
vlive.english: [So unwell to carry on] he needed to be taken back to Seoul today...

examples.korean: She yelled out in pain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아파서 소리를 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She yelled out in pain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He screeched with pain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 아파서 날카로운 비명을 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He screeched with pain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a squeal of pain 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아파서 꽤액 지르는 비명 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a squeal of pain Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Lee was ill so I went instead. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 리가 아파서 내가 대신 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lee was ill so I went instead. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: to give a grunt of effort/pain 듣기 Add to Wordbook 용을 쓰느라/아파서 끙 앓는 소리를 내다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to give a grunt of effort/pain Add to Wordbook
